statements: SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT subscriber_name, magazine_name FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscription_id, subscriber_name FROM subscriptions WHERE magazine_name = 'National Geographic';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, magazine_name FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscriber_name = 'Alice';
SELECT magazine_name, subscription_date FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_name, magazine_name FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_date <= '2022-03-15' ORDER BY magazine_name ASC;
SELECT subscriber_name, COUNT(*) AS total_subscriptions FROM subscriptions GROUP BY subscriber_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT id, magazine_name FROM literary_magazines;
SELECT * FROM literary_magazines WHERE subscription_cost > 50;
SELECT magazine_name, subscription_start_date FROM literary_magazines ORDER BY subscription_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM newsletters;
SELECT newsletter_name, author_name, publish_date FROM newsletters WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT magazine_name, subscription_cost FROM literary_magazines WHERE subscription_cost > 50 ORDER BY subscription_start_date DESC;
SELECT magazine_name, subscription_start_date FROM literary_magazines WHERE subscription_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM newsletters WHERE author_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT magazine_name, subscription_cost FROM literary_magazines WHERE subscription_cost > 20 AND subscription_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY subscription_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM newsletters WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01' AND publish_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email, start_date FROM subscriptions;
SELECT magazine_name, category, frequency, price FROM magazines;
SELECT newsletter_name, publisher FROM newsletters;

SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email, magazine_name, newsletter_name FROM subscriptions JOIN magazines ON subscriptions.magazine_id = magazines.magazine_id JOIN newsletters ON subscriptions.newsletter_id = newsletters.newsletter_id;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscriber_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT magazine_name, publisher, price FROM magazines WHERE category = 'Fashion';
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email, magazine_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions JOIN magazines ON subscriptions.magazine_id = magazines.magazine_id;
SELECT magazine_name, publisher, subscription_fee FROM magazines JOIN newsletters ON magazines.magazine_id = newsletters.magazine_id WHERE frequency = 'Weekly';

SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email, magazine_name, newsletter_name, subscription_fee FROM subscriptions JOIN magazines ON subscriptions.magazine_id = magazines.magazine_id JOIN newsletters ON subscriptions.newsletter_id = newsletters.newsletter_id;
SELECT * FROM magazine_subscriptions;
SELECT subscriber_name, magazine_name FROM magazine_subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscription_date FROM newsletter_subscriptions WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM subscription_notifications WHERE notification_date <= '2021-07-31';
SELECT subscription_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM subscription_payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM magazine_subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT subscriber_name, magazine_name FROM magazine_subscriptions WHERE subscriber_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT magazine_name, COUNT(*) as total_subscriptions FROM magazine_subscriptions GROUP BY magazine_name ORDER BY total_subscriptions DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM magazine_subscriptions JOIN subscription_payments ON magazine_subscriptions.subscription_id = subscription_payments.subscription_id;

SELECT subscriber_name, notification_message, notification_date FROM magazine_subscriptions JOIN subscription_notifications ON magazine_subscriptions.subscription_id = subscription_notifications.subscription_id;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscriber_name = 'Alice';
SELECT subscriber_name, magazine_id FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_name, magazine_name, yearly_price FROM subscriptions JOIN magazines ON subscriptions.magazine_id = magazines.magazine_id;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, publisher_name FROM subscriptions JOIN magazines ON subscriptions.magazine_id = magazines.magazine_id WHERE yearly_price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT subscriber_name, magazine_id FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_date >= '2021-01-01' AND subscription_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT subscriber_name, publisher_name FROM subscriptions JOIN magazines ON subscriptions.magazine_id = magazines.magazine_id WHERE magazine_name = 'Tech Magazine';
SELECT subscriber_name, subscription_date FROM subscriptions WHERE magazine_id = 1 AND subscriber_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT subscriber_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions_history WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
